title: Fix some issues reported by lintian
body:
Fix some issues reported by lintian
* debian/copyright: use spaces rather than tabs to start continuation lines. ([tab-in-license-text](https://lintian.debian.org/tags/tab-in-license-text.html))
* Use secure URI in Homepage field. ([homepage-field-uses-insecure-uri](https://lintian.debian.org/tags/homepage-field-uses-insecure-uri.html))
* Bump debhelper from old 9 to 12. ([package-uses-old-debhelper-compat-version](https://lintian.debian.org/tags/package-uses-old-debhelper-compat-version.html))
* Set debhelper-compat version in Build-Depends. ([uses-debhelper-compat-file](https://lintian.debian.org/tags/uses-debhelper-compat-file.html))
* Set upstream metadata fields: Bug-Database, Bug-Submit, Repository, Repository-Browse. ([upstream-metadata-file-is-missing](https://lintian.debian.org/tags/upstream-metadata-file-is-missing.html))
* Use canonical URL in Vcs-Git. ([vcs-field-not-canonical](https://lintian.debian.org/tags/vcs-field-not-canonical.html))


This merge proposal was created automatically by the [Janitor bot](https://janitor.debian.net/lintian-fixes).

You can follow up to this merge proposal as you normally would.

Build and test logs for this branch can be found at
https://janitor.debian.net/lintian-fixes/pkg/datalad/0cc5cb72-5b07-4511-969c-c61642cfb627.


## Debdiff

These changes affect the binary packages:


File lists identical (after any substitutions)
### Control files of package datalad: lines which differ (wdiff format)
* Homepage: [-http​://datalad.org-] {+https​://datalad.org+}
### Control files of package python3-datalad: lines which differ (wdiff format)
* Homepage: [-http​://datalad.org-] {+https​://datalad.org+}


You can also view the [diffoscope diff](https://janitor.debian.net/api/run/0cc5cb72-5b07-4511-969c-c61642cfb627/diffoscope?filter_boring=1) ([unfiltered](https://janitor.debian.net/api/run/0cc5cb72-5b07-4511-969c-c61642cfb627/diffoscope)).
